plot: A socialite betrays his gang to police, kills a lord, abducts an heiress and is killed by a minion.
title: A World of Sin
plot_es: A socialite betrays his gang to police, kills a lord, abducts an heiress and is killed by a minion.
plot_en: A socialite betrays his gang to police, kills a lord, abducts an heiress and is killed by a minion.
